tip.pearl.1:
§7Wandering Spirit§r: Spawns after player death, carrying all items.
Moves to the nearest air block on Y-axis.
Use §9Chaos Soul Cage§r to retrieve items.
tip.pearl.2:
First Goal: Prioritize crafting §9Chaos Soul Cage§r,
or you'll lose items upon death!
Start by making §9Primordial Cage§r.
tip.pearl.3:
§9Primordial Cage§r: Hold in off-hand to capture drifting §5§lQingdu§r fragments,
making them visible near you.
tip.pearl.4:
§5§lQingdu§r: The realm of Chi. Years ago, it shattered,
scattering fragments across the world.
tip.pearl.5:
§5§lQingdu§r§5 Fragments§r: Contain unique resources like 『Primordial Chi』,
used to craft §9Roaming Chi Cage§r.
tip.pearl.6:
§9Roaming Chi Cage§r: Captures 『Celestial Yang Chi』, 『Abyssal Yin Chi』,
and 『Living Harmony Chi』.
tip.pearl.7:
§9Chaos Soul Cage§r: Has all functions of §9Roaming Chi Cage§r,
plus stores past-life §iWandering Spirits§r to extract Soul Chi.
tip.pearl.8:
『Chaos Core Chi』: Born from three Chi and treasure energy.
Used to craft §9Chaos Orb§r and §9Chaos Soul Cage§r.
tip.pearl.9: §9Cracked Chi Core§r: Fragile. Breaking it yields traces of 『Primordial Chi』.
tip.pearl.10:
§9Withered Chi Bush§r grows on §9Stagnant Chi Block§r.
Breaking drops §9Chi Apples§r.
tip.pearl.11:
『Primordial Chi』: Found in §5§lQingdu§r§5 Fragments§r.
Used to craft §9Roaming Chi Cage§r.
tip.pearl.12: §9Chi Apple§r: Non-nourishing. Grants levitation and rare powerful buffs.
tip.pearl.13:
§9Primordial Pearl§r: Grants basic knowledge until §9Chaos Soul Cage§r is made.
Also used to craft §9Chaos Orb§r and §9Primordial Cage§r.
tip.pearl.14:
Progression: After crafting §9Chaos Soul Cage§r,
use §9Primordial Pearl§r to make §9Chaos Orb§r for advanced knowledge.
tip.pearl.15:
Commands: §2/killghost§r clears all spirits within 20000 blocks §4(use carefully)§r.
§2/givepearl§r grants a §9Primordial Pearl§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.1:
§7Wandering Spirit§r: Helps the next life by delivering §9Chaos Soul Cage§r
(or related items) from its inventory. Follows and occasionally communicates.
tip.chaos_pearl.2:
§5§lQingdu§r: Once where souls departed. After the catastrophe,
souls wander the world, retaining fragmented memories.
tip.chaos_pearl.3: 『Spectral Soul Chi』: Extracted from player souls. Used to craft §9Soulbrand Gem§r and §9Soul Chi Apple§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.4: §9Afterlife Beacon§r: Summons all past-life spirits. Requires §9Chaos Orb§r to activate.
tip.chaos_pearl.5:
§9Soulbrand Gem§r: Contains player data from §iWandering Spirits§r.
Essential for §9Afterlife Beacon§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.6: §9Chaos Orb§r: Holds advanced knowledge. Activates §9Afterlife Beacon§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.7: §eSoulshift§r: Become ghost-like and untargetable for a duration.
tip.chaos_pearl.8:
Repair: Use 『Primordial Chi』 on anvil for §9Roaming Chi Cage§r,
『Chaos Core Chi』 for §9Chaos Soul Cage§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.9: §9Soul Chi Apple§r: Grants §eSoulshift§r but reduces interaction ability.
